Name: InstanceExtender
Description: InstanceExtender extends instances with common and useful functions.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.extendNewInstance
InstanceFunctions.Description: Extends instance with new instance creation functionality.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.extendField
InstanceFunctions.Description: Extends instance with field and related setter and getter functions.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.extendFieldObserver
InstanceFunctions.Description: Extends instance with field observer interface and related setter and getter functions.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.extendContentTypeObject
InstanceFunctions.Description: Extends instance with content object type extraction functions.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.extendContentObserver
InstanceFunctions.Description: Extends instance with content observer type extraction functions.
